title: The M Word
description: There's nothing wrong with an arranged marriage, as long as she does the arranging.Having been burned by love, Brenda doesnâ€™t believe in happily ever after.But she wants a baby and Marius could use a green card, so she decides to take a practical approach. The M-word is book two in the Summer Wedding Series, where two friends both make quick trips to the altar one summer. Book one is Forgotten Honeymoon. They are quirky, sweet romances.
author: Beverly Farr
